title: Print, "Design for State Bedchamber, in Second Livre d'Appartement (Second Book on Interiors)", ca. 1700
medium: Etching and engraving on white laid paper
signed: Signed in plate, lower left: Marot fecit auec Preuillege des Etats Generaux. des Province W et d hol et West Frisse.
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Design for a bedchamber with allover patterning of rinceaux and curved lines and cartouches.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Design for State Bedchamber, in Second Livre d'Appartement (Second Book on Interiors)", ca. 1700.
ca. 1700. Etching and engraving on white laid paper. Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund. 1988-4-54.
